subject: Boxing
Regulation and Deregulation of Industry
lead_paragraph: The longtime boxing judge Melvina Lathan was named by Gov. David A. Paterson to lead the New York State Athletic Commission, which regulates professional boxing in the state. Lathan has judged 83 world championship fights and was confirmed by the State Senate last year as the first female African-American commissioner.
